alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Marion; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 16 at 7:15AM CST until December 16 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Bledsoe, Sequatchie and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sequatchie River near Whitwell TN. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural land occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 AM CST Friday was 14.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 4.9 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 600 PM CST.
